column5: We went to Rush Lake in September 2001. The outfit at Air Ivanhoe was great. Cabin was perfect, fishing was great. Anyone else have experience with fly-ins, we are looking for Northern Pike with walleyes a second choice for meals.Anyone get to any of the other lakes that Air Ivanhoe uses.Thanks

Stayed at Forearm August 2000. Forearm was poor - pike only and not much size. Fished an adjacent lake and caught some nice smallies. Give me some more details on what fishing success you had at Rush. Our cabin and the service was fine - just didn't get the fishing we have experienced at other fly ins.
